column1: Track my important tasks. Add a row to 'Important Events Log' by SMS.
Send a text with #twit and post a tweet to Twitter
Send a text with #tweet and post a tweet to Twitter
Turn off the #Hue lights with #Siri. Message must say "#Off"
Save gmail attachments to dropbox if mail is labeled "Dropbox"
Deliciuos tagged RSS add to feedly
Add events to your Google calendar by sending a text message with #calendar
#cieye
Saves Mailbox 'To Read' items to Pocket.
log news #alerts in #google #calendar
log news #alerts in #google #calendar
send an email when you label a message work
Si en Delicious aparecen tags #fb entonces aparecen enlaces en Facebook.
Text #blue to change your hue lights to American blue #4thofJulight
Text #white to change your hue lights to American white #4thofJulight
Text #red to change your hue lights to American red #4thofJulight
Label a Gmail "Evernote" to send it there
If I #leave turn off the lights.
If I #leave turn off the lights.
Add event to #GoogleCalendar for #tasks at #work by #Gmail
Add new Diigo bookmarks tagged "fli" to Delicious.
I want breakfast #covermymeds
Diigo to Pocket on tagged 'Pocket'.
SMS message with #fb to Facebook Status
Flip on the lights with an SMS tagged #on
Flip off the lights with an SMS tagged #off
Push a reminder to Beja App when there is a new message labeled 'BejaApp'.
Send an email labeled #off to trigger@recipe.ifttt.com to switch WeMo off
Send an email labeled #on to trigger@recipe.ifttt.com to switch WeMo on
Toggle your WeMo Light Switch via SMS (#switch)
send #bikingtoronto links on #delicious to #facebook page
If i send UP a text with the tag "water" log that I drank a glass of water to up.
Track read #comixology #comics
If I #leave turn off the lights.
Use Liam Neeson's badass quote from "Taken" to scare someone into returning your phone.
Text #FC to upload to Pool Water Test Results to Google calendar.
